sentences: The young boy was eager and able to read on his own.
She's an able-bodied athlete.
He is physically able to climb steep mountains.
She is physically able to climb mountains.
With practice, he became increasingly able to meditate for longer periods.
It was amazing how the bird was able to fly with just one wing.
Despite his limitations, he was able to adapt quickly.
After overcoming the fear, he felt mentally able to face any obstacle.
They were able to complete the project within the given deadline.
Despite the challenge, she remained determined and able to learn new skills.
The company announced it would be unable to meet its quarterly targets.
They were unable to reach an agreement on the contract terms.
The chef accidentally dropped the ingredients, unable to salvage the dish.
They were unable to reach the evacuation site during the storm.
The baby showed signs of being unable to latch onto the breastfeed.
The old man couldn't hear well and was unable to follow the conversation.
She was unable to comprehend the complex concept.
Despite trying multiple times, she remained unable to solve the puzzle.
Due to unforeseen circumstances, the flight was unable to take off.
She was unable to find her keys despite searching everywhere.
Soil nutrients preferentially reach the abaxial root tips during uptake.
Researchers investigate the abaxial side's response to environmental stresses.
Under a microscope, you can see distinct abaxial cell walls in this cork sample.
On some fruits, an abaxial lobe protects seeds from predators.
Abaxial growth on plants occurs at the lower and outer regions.
In botanical terminology, the abaxial epidermis covers the back surface.
Abaxial petal movements are crucial for pollination in many flowers.
The seed coat displays an abaxial ridging for better water storage.
The abaxial margin of the flower often helps with wind dispersal.
The abaxial side of the leaf is often paler due to less exposure.
The butterfly's bright blue underside contrasted with its duller dorsal markings.
The roof of the ancient temple had intricate carvings on the dorsal walls.
The reptile curled into a protective position with its dorsal scales facing up.
The spinal column exhibits a distinct dorsal ridge for support.
The dorsal fin of the shark slicing through the water was majestic.
The whale's large dorsal hump provided stability during migration.
The giraffe's tall dorsal pillar allows it to reach leaves high in trees.
The dolphin's acrobatic flips revealed their supple dorsal musculature.
The museum displayed fossils from prehistoric creatures featuring broad dorsal plates.
In medical research, examining the mammalian spine from the dorsal perspective is crucial.
Researchers observed fungal growth exclusively on the adaxial bark of old oak trees.
Our team measured the height difference between the two plants using their respective adaxial growth indicators.
In taxonomy, the adaxial side of a flower is often more visible than the abaxial.

When comparing leaves under light microscopy, they showed distinct patterns based on their adaxial sides.
The adaxial surface of the leaf was smooth and greasy.
The tree's branches spread outwards along its adaxial growth pattern.
The adaxial region of the bird's beak served for catching insects efficiently.
The plant's stem had a thickened adaxial side to protect against water loss.
The insect molted, revealing its bright red exoskeleton on the adaxial segments.
